CustomField.formula:
(IF( DRA_Request__c = TRUE,
(IF(ISBLANK ( Surgeon_Champion__c ) , 0, 0.10) + IF(ISBLANK (Admin_Champ_Contact_Complete__c ) , 0, 0.08) + IF(! Executive_IT_Sign_Off__c , 0, 0.16) + IF( ! Contract_Deployment__c, 0, 0.06) + IF(! Redline_Agreement__c , 0, 0.16) + IF(ISBLANK( NextStep ), 0, 0.08) + IF(ISBLANK( CloseDate ), 0, 0.08)+ IF (! Align_Growth_Opportunity__c ,0,0.08)+ IF(! Supply_Chain_Agreement__c, 0 ,0.08)+ IF(! DRA_Request__c , 0, 0.06)+ IF (! Pricing_Approval__c , 0,0.06)),
(IF(ISBLANK ( Surgeon_Champion__c ) , 0, 0.10) + IF(ISBLANK (Admin_Champ_Contact_Complete__c ) , 0, 0.10) + IF(! Executive_IT_Sign_Off__c , 0, 0.25) + IF( ! Contract_Deployment__c, 0, 0.10) + IF(! Redline_Agreement__c , 0, 0.25) + IF(ISBLANK( NextStep ), 0, 0.10) + IF(ISBLANK( CloseDate ), 0, 0.10))))
CustomField.label: MyMobility Opp %
